text: Tini balalena -- ''tomadera ki hayechila yakhana tomara i'usuphake kamana karechile tara antarangatara?’’ Tara balale -- allah‌ra ki nikhumta srsti! Amara ora madhye kono dosera katha jani na.’’ Nagara-pradhanera stri balale -- ''eksane satya prakasa peyeche, ami'i take kamana karechilama tara antarangatara, ara nihsandeha se abasya'i chila satyaparayanadera madhyekara.’’
